name: Goblet's Dredges
desc: There is a #1[i]% base chance to inflict 1 stack of Arcana when a target enters battle. Every time an enemy target receives DoT during a single attack by an ally, there is a #1[i]% base chance for the target to be inflicted with 1 stack of Arcana, stacking up to #2[i] time(s) during 1 single attack.
